name: Seven Doorways
description:
Seven Doorways is an experiment based on my ongoing Sketch of the Day project. Inspired by the idea of daily exploration, Seven Doorways presents you with a different environment depending on which day of the week it is when you run it.

It's an exercise in slowing down and not worrying about goals or mechanics. There's nothing to do but hang out for a little while and enjoy your surroundings. Feel no pressure to stay, leave when you want and visit again another day for a new experience.

This is more of a small prototype than a game (it was developed over roughly one week, as an entry to the Slow Game Jam), but it serves as a test for a larger game I plan on developing one day using this art style and mood.

Controls:

Arrows or WASD - Move

Space - Use Staff
